trend_summary: Over the series, the landscape shifts from mixed forest-agriculture mosaic toward more intensively farmed countryside. Fields increase in number and size, forest patches shrink and fragment, and a few villages extend marginally along the main transport axis. Built-up cover remains low, keeping the area predominantly rural with sparse development.
notable_changes: Expansion and consolidation of arable fields, especially in the northern half of the scene
Progressive reduction and fragmentation of contiguous forest blocks in the centreâ€“south
Minor growth of village footprints and scattered new rooftops along the main east-west corridor
Addition or upgrade of a straight road segment crossing the central belt
Creation of a small pond/reservoir on the eastern edge
